```{r}
# I hope the county lines haven't changed a huge amount, but it's entirely possible that they did

GA_raw <- get_acs(geography = "county",
              variables = c(medincome = "B19013_001"),
              state = "GA", 
              year = 2010,
              geometry = T)

GA <- GA_raw %>% 
  select(-c(variable, estimate, moe)) 

# cleaning county names for join

GA_final <- GA %>% 
  mutate(NAME = str_remove(NAME, " County, Georgia"))


```
